Author: mangerinez
Text: Oh yeah, same, i mean i love/hate it. My parents tell me that i’m losing too much weight and there’s this conflict in my head that’s like “they literally have no idea what they’re talking about, i wish i were thin” but also “aw hell yeahhh i’m losing weight!!”

Author: VegetarianCurry
Text: TW: distorted reasoning.      It is normal, I get that too. My doctors say it's common in people with anorexia nervosa, the disorder would distort anything to get this kind of validation, whether people would compliment me ("so I am doing everything right!"), get scared ("for real? But it is never enough") or say I don't look so skinny ("I will show you what  I am capable of!"). It is part of the disorder. I really have a hard time ignoring that voice.
